channel.title: LONG HAUL 1983, my new solo RPG, is free for the Gauntlet community
channel.description:
![cover basic - white|690x459](upload://biPNZyldH8Y4Y3SNO4rdoa8uyaG.jpeg) Hey folks & friends!
A month ago, I released a solo RPG called [**LONG HAUL 1983**](https://spc.itch.io/longhaul1983). The game has been well received and supported. People are actually playing it. Everyone has been super cool.
The Gauntlet -- the podcasts, the cons, the publications, the people -- has been a foundational & essential element of my gaming life. I appreciate you all. Sincerely. **So please help yourself to my new game.**
It's pay-what-you-like for you when you use [**this link** (spc.itch.io/gauntlet)](https://spc.itch.io/gauntlet). If that means you pick it up for free, please do so. If that means you'd like to purchase it at a big discount, rock on. Whatever fits your budget and floats your boat.
All my love, Sean
PS - The link will be active through 4/25. If you're reading this post in the future and would like to grab a free/discounted copy, just send me a message. Cheers!
